title: Manufacturing Lead Status Verification by Marketing Intern
description: A marketing intern must verify the status of a manufacturing lead using only the company name amidst several duplicate entries.
initial_human_prompt: Hi, I need to check the current status of a company named 'SteelWorks Co'. Can you help me with this?

personas.name: Jasmine Rivera
personas.description: Jasmine is a 22-year-old marketing intern, eager to learn but still unfamiliar with many of the company's CRM processes. This is her first major internship, and she's passionate about acquiring practical skills to boost her resume. She communicates directly and seeks help readily due to her beginner status.

personas.name: crm_lead_qualifier
personas.description: A CRM agent responsible for looking up lead details, scoring them, and updating records appropriately.
characteristics: Consistent in providing detailed lead information
Capable of resolving database issues with duplicate entries

setting.location: Jasmine's cubicle in the open-plan marketing office
setting.environment_description: The office is bustling with activity as a marketing campaign is underway. Jasmine feels mildly pressured due to time constraints.

expected_tools.usage_context: To search for the company 'SteelWorks Co' to confirm its current lead status.

objectives: Verify the current status of 'SteelWorks Co' in the CRM
constraints: Limited to using only the company name for lookup
Must deal with the issue of duplicate entries

grader.description: Simplified evaluation for CRM lead qualification agent

workflow_completion.description: Agent follows proper lead qualification workflow

messages.content: You are an expert CRM workflow evaluator. You are provided logs of length {{ sample|length }}. Score how well the agent followed the proper workflow: lookup lead → score industry → update database (1=poor workflow, 3=excellent workflow).

workflow_score.description: 1-3 score where 3 indicates excellent workflow execution
workflow_score.title: Workflow Score

qualification_reasoning.description: Agent provides clear reasoning for qualification decisions

messages.content: You are an expert sales process evaluator. You are provided logs of length {{ sample|length }}. Score the quality of reasoning provided for lead qualification decisions (1=poor reasoning, 3=excellent reasoning).

response_format__json_schema__schema.description: Quality score for qualification reasoning (1-3 scale)

reasoning_quality.description: 1-3 score where 3 indicates excellent qualification reasoning
reasoning_quality.title: Reasoning Quality

response_format__json_schema__schema.title: QualificationReasoning

communication_quality.description: Agent maintains professional and clear communication

messages.content: You are an expert communication evaluator. You are provided logs of length {{ sample|length }}. Score the professionalism and clarity of the agent's communication (1=poor communication, 3=excellent communication).

communication_score.description: 1-3 score where 3 indicates excellent professional communication
communication_score.title: Communication Score

messages.content: You are an expert task completion evaluator. You are provided logs of length {{ sample|length }}. Determine if the assistant successfully completed the lead qualification task requested by the user.

task_completed.description: True if the lead qualification task was completed successfully
task_completed.title: Task Completed

grader.calculate_output:
def calculate_output(grader_outputs_map):
    workflow = grader_outputs_map.get('workflow_completion', {}).get('workflow_score', 1)
    reasoning = grader_outputs_map.get('qualification_reasoning', {}).get('reasoning_quality', 1)
    communication = grader_outputs_map.get('communication_quality', {}).get('communication_score', 1)
    task_complete = grader_outputs_map.get('task_completion', {}).get('task_completed', False)
    
    overall_score = (float(workflow) + float(reasoning) + float(communication)) / 9.0
    
    return (workflow + reasoning + communication) / 3
